Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Kostner/5th
ShortDescription: EB 7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via: Kostner, Jackson, Pulaski, and Harrision, due to, street blockage, near Kostner/5th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via: Kostner, Jackson, Pulaski, and Harrision, due to, street blockage, near Kostner/5th.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line and Loop-bound Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line and Loop-bound Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays  following earlier police activity at Morgan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line and Loop-bound Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays  following earlier police activity at Morgan.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
